sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF: Initially cloned into pBluescript: Cx43 insert digested out with EcoRV from Addgene plasmid #27383 and IRES-GFP digested from pIRES2-EGFP Addgene plasmid 3178 from clontech using BamHI-NotI. Entire Cx43-IRES-GFP cloned from pBluescript into pLPCX using XhoI and NotI.
